page.title: 02AROUND AND ABOUT LALEHAM
page.content: We live on the borders of{Staines and Laleham.It is really quite peaceful here.London Airport is very near but the planes don't go over very much so it is quite quiet. There are a few busy roads like the Kingston Road but most of the roads are full of houses for people to live in. There are a few shops in our area but they are not very big.They are collected up in two places called {Edinburgh Drive and the Broadway}and there are some odd ones by themselves.There is not a bank here but there are 2 post offices.There are a few schools and places for children to go like Cubs,Brownies,swimming,dancing and gymnastics.There are 2 or 3 parks to play in It is really a nice place to live.
